document.full_text: south korea's kia motors aims to boost its u.s. production capacity by one fifth next year, to meet soaring demand for new models such as the optima sedan in the world's second-biggest auto market.
document.title: kia motors to boost u.s. business
lines_and_colors: south korea's kia motors aims to boost its u.s. production capacity by one fifth next year, to meet soaring demand for new models such as the optima sedan in the world's second-biggest auto market.
